price: Na tukaigeuza nchi juu chini, na tukawanyeshea mvua ya mawe ya udongo wa Motoni.
arabic: فَجَعَلۡنَا عَٰلِيَهَا سَافِلَهَا وَأَمۡطَرۡنَا عَلَيۡهِمۡ حِجَارَةٗ مِّن سِجِّيلٍ
footnotes: Mwenyezi Mungu Aliye takasika katekeleza hukumu yake, akasema: Miji yao tukaifanya juu chini kwa kuivuruga, na tukawateremshia udongo ulio fanyika mawe ukiwateremkia kama mvua. Majumba yao yakaporomoka. Na wakitoka nje hukuta hiyo mvua ya mawe. Kwa hivyo wakawa wamezungukwa kila jiha. (upande)

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: fajaʿalnā ʿāliyahā sāfilahā wa-amṭarnā ʿalayhim ḥijāratan min sijjīlin
